name: VideoConvertor
description: A stable and Fast telegram video convertor bot which can compress, convert(video into audio and other video formats), rename and trim.

HEROKU_API.description: Your heroku app name(optional, add only if you want to restart directly from tg.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku api, you can get it from heroku account settings(optional, add only if you want to restart directly from tg.
